Container.Name: PhotoPrism-Helper
Container.Overview: PhotoPrism Helper is an unofficial companion tool created for use alongside PhotoPrism. This project isn't associated with the PhotoPrism project, it's just a companion tool created to extend the functionality of PhotoPrism.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider Donating.
Container.Description: PhotoPrism Helper is an unofficial companion tool created for use alongside PhotoPrism. This project isn't associated with the PhotoPrism project, it's just a companion tool created to extend the functionality of PhotoPrism.

Config.Name: Host Port
Config.Description: The port the helper is hosted on. Container Port: 2343

Config.Name: PhotoPrism Site URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: PHOTOPRISM_SITE_URL

Config.Name: PhotoPrism Username
Config.Description: The PhotoPrism username you want the helper to use for access.

Config.Name: PhotoPrism Password
Config.Description: The PhotoPrism password associated with the username.

Config.Name: Helper API Key
Config.Description: The API key you'll use to query the helper API.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: The timezone of your instance.

Config.Name: Import Timeout
Config.Description: The number of milliseconds the import function should wait for a success message before timing out.

Config.Name: Auto Import
Config.Description: Enable/Disable the auto-import feature.

Config.Name: Auto Import Cron Schedule
Config.Description: The cron expression for when to run auto-import.

Config.Name: Index After Auto Import
Config.Description: Enable/Disable the index after auto-importing feature.

Config.Name: ISDOCKER
Config.Description: Tells the helper instance if it is running in a Docker container. Container Variable: ISDOCKER

Config.Name: Logfile Path
Config.Description: The logging file path.

Config.Name: Log Level - Console
Config.Description: The log level to apply to the console log.

Config.Name: Log Level - File
Config.Description: The log level to apply to the file log.

Config.Name: Send Errors to the Developer
Config.Description: Enable/Disable sending errors/exceptions to the dev.

Config.Name: Error Log URL (Dev)
Config.Description: The URL to send errors to. (Don't change unless you're running your own fork of the helper)

Config.Name: Error Log Key (Dev)
Config.Description: The API key sent with error logs to the external server.

Config.Name: Anonymise Error Logs
Config.Description: Enable/Disable anonymising externally sent error logs.

Config.Name: Send Options in Error Log
Config.Description: Enable/Disable sending your configuration options with externally sent errors.

Config.Name: Add Logging to External Server
Config.Description: Enable/Disable sending logs to an external log server.

Config.Name: External Log Depth
Config.Description: The log level to apply to the external log.

Config.Name: External Log URL
Config.Description: The URL of the external log server.

Config.Name: External Log API Key
Config.Description: The API key sent with logs sent to the external log server.

Config.Name: Anonymise External Logs
Config.Description: Enable/Disable anonymising externally sent logs.

Config.Name: Send Options in External Logs
Config.Description: Enable/Disable sending your configuration options with externally sent logs.
